title: Nostalgic Gaming Timepieces - The Retro Gaming Watch Brings Gameplay to the Wrist (TrendHunter.com)
text:
The Retro Gaming Watch has been designed by Jason Rogers as a nostalgic wearable that incorporates video games onto the wrist of the wearer for avid players alike to appreciate.
The watch merges the functionality of a smartwatch with a mobile gaming console to keep users connected to incoming notifications, text messages and, of course, the current time. The wearable, however, features a clamshell construction that will open to reveal an additional display on the interior alongside controls to let users play a range of 8-bit and 16-bit games at their leisure.
The Retro Gaming Watch responds to the continued popularity of nostalgic gameplay experiences and accommodates impromptu play throughout the day. The watch can be easily removed from the strap to allow for easier use.
